Name: Valhalla：Awakening of Valkyrie
About the game: Join the Discord We have now opened the discord community, if you have any questions (￣y▽,￣)╭, please click the discord link on the right of (that is, support language below) join us ┏(゜ω ゜)=☞ You can also add our channel in discord: Do you have any questions? I guess you have! ! With the advent of Ragnarok, the Protoss forces are insufficient, and most of the Valkyries in the Hall of Valor are living in various parts of the continent as human beings. You must lift the seal on them to summon them. Doomsday omen: According to legend, under the root of the tree of the world, there is the spring Hwagmir and a poisonous dragon 'Nidhogg' that constantly eats the roots. It kept biting the roots of the tree until the day when it bit the tree, Ragnarok would come. Odin selected heroic warriors from the daughters of the kings of the earth and his own daughters in order to expand the forces of the gods to meet the needs of the battlefield before the Ragnarok of the gods. These warriors are called Valkyries (Valkyrie). ) This is a casual game that combines 'match three + collection + dress up'. The same stones can be eliminated by clicking and dragging with the mouse. Each level has a limited number of moves, and you need to complete the required number of stones within the limited number of times to successfully pass the level. More of the same stone can bring a combo effect. Each time you pass a level, you will be rewarded with gold coins or items, which can be used to buy different sets of characters.
